node.name: stp
node.description: Top-level container for spanning tree configuration and state dataNone

node.name: global
node.description: Global configuration and state dataNone

node.name: config
node.description: Global spanning tree configurationNone

node.name: enabled-protocol
node.description: List of the spanning tree protocols enabled on the deviceNone

node.name: bridge-assurance
node.description: Enable bridge assurance to protect against unidirectional link failureNone

node.name: etherchannel-misconfig-guard
node.description: EtherChannel guard detects a misconfigured EtherChannel when interfaces on the switch are configured as an EtherChannel while interfaces on the other device are not or when not all the interfaces on the other device are in the same EtherChannel.None

node.name: bpduguard-timeout-recovery
node.description: Amount of time, in seconds, the interface receiving BPDUs is disabled. Once the timeout expires, the interface is brought back into service.None

node.name: loop-guard
node.description: The loop guard default setting for the bridgeNone

node.name: bpdu-guard
node.description: Enable edge port BPDU guardNone

node.name: bpdu-filter
node.description: Enable edge port BPDU filterNone

node.name: state
node.description: Global spanning tree stateNone

node.name: enabled-protocol
node.description: List of the spanning tree protocols enabled on the deviceNone

node.name: bridge-assurance
node.description: Enable bridge assurance to protect against unidirectional link failureNone

node.name: etherchannel-misconfig-guard
node.description: EtherChannel guard detects a misconfigured EtherChannel when interfaces on the switch are configured as an EtherChannel while interfaces on the other device are not or when not all the interfaces on the other device are in the same EtherChannel.None

node.name: bpduguard-timeout-recovery
node.description: Amount of time, in seconds, the interface receiving BPDUs is disabled. Once the timeout expires, the interface is brought back into service.None

node.name: loop-guard
node.description: The loop guard default setting for the bridgeNone

node.name: bpdu-guard
node.description: Enable edge port BPDU guardNone

node.name: bpdu-filter
node.description: Enable edge port BPDU filterNone

node.name: rstp
node.description: Rapid Spanning-tree protocol configuration and operation dataNone

node.name: config
node.description: Configuration data for RSTPNone

node.name: hello-time
node.description: The interval between periodic transmissions of configuration messages by designated portsNone

node.name: max-age
node.description: The maximum age of the information transmitted by the bridge when it is the root bridgeNone

node.name: forwarding-delay
node.description: The delay used by STP bridges to transition root and designated ports to forwardingNone

node.name: hold-count
node.description: the maximum number of BPDUs per second that the switch can send from an interfaceNone

node.name: bridge-priority
node.description: The manageable component of the Bridge IdentifierNone

node.name: state
node.description: Operational state data for RSTPNone

node.name: hello-time
node.description: The interval between periodic transmissions of configuration messages by designated portsNone

node.name: max-age
node.description: The maximum age of the information transmitted by the bridge when it is the root bridgeNone

node.name: forwarding-delay
node.description: The delay used by STP bridges to transition root and designated ports to forwardingNone

node.name: hold-count
node.description: the maximum number of BPDUs per second that the switch can send from an interfaceNone

node.name: bridge-priority
node.description: The manageable component of the Bridge IdentifierNone

node.name: bridge-address
node.description: A unique 48-bit Universally Administered MAC Address assigned to the bridgeNone

node.name: designated-root-priority
node.description: The bridge priority of the root of the spanning tree, as determined by the Spanning Tree Protocol, as executed by this nodeNone

node.name: designated-root-address
node.description: The bridge address of the root of the spanning tree, as determined by the Spanning Tree Protocol, as executed by this nodeNone

node.name: root-port
node.description: The port number of the port which offers the lowest cost path from this bridge to the root bridgeNone

node.name: root-cost
node.description: The cost of the path to the root as seen from this bridgeNone

node.name: hold-time
node.description: This time value determines the interval length during which no more than two Configuration bridge PDUs shall be transmitted by this nodeNone

node.name: topology-changes
node.description: The total number of topology changes detected by this bridge since the management entity was last reset or initializedNone

node.name: time-since-topology-change
node.description: The time (in hundredths of a second) since the last time a topology change was detected by the bridge entityNone

node.name: interfaces
node.description: Enclosing container for the list of interface referencesNone

node.name: interface
node.description: List of interfaces on which STP is enableNone

node.name: name
node.description: Reference to the list keyNone

node.name: config
node.description: Configuration data for STP on each interfaceNone

node.name: name
node.description: Reference to the STP ethernet interfaceNone

node.name: cost
node.description: The port's contribution, when it is the Root Port, to the Root Path Cost for the BridgeNone

node.name: port-priority
node.description: The manageable component of the Port Identifier, also known as the Port PriorityNone

node.name: state
node.description: Operational state data for STP on each interfaceNone

node.name: name
node.description: Reference to the STP ethernet interfaceNone

node.name: cost
node.description: The port's contribution, when it is the Root Port, to the Root Path Cost for the BridgeNone

node.name: port-priority
node.description: The manageable component of the Port Identifier, also known as the Port PriorityNone

node.name: port-num
node.description: The port number of the bridge portNone

node.name: role
node.description: The current role of the bridge portNone

node.name: port-state
node.description: The current state of the bridge portNone

node.name: designated-root-priority
node.description: The bridge priority of the bridge recorded as the root in the configuration BPDUs transmitted by the designated bridge for the segment to which the port is attachedNone

node.name: designated-root-address
node.description: The bridge address of the bridge recorded as the root in the configuration BPDUs transmitted by the designated bridge for the segment to which the port is attachedNone

node.name: designated-cost
node.description: The path cost of the Designated Port of the segment connected to this portNone

node.name: designated-bridge-priority
node.description: The bridge priority of the bridge that this port considers to be the designated bridge for this port's segment.None

node.name: designated-bridge-address
node.description: The bridge address of the bridge that this port considers to be the designated bridge for this port's segment.None

node.name: designated-port-priority
node.description: The Port priority of the port on the Designated Bridge for this port's segment, two octet stringNone

node.name: designated-port-num
node.description: The Port number of the port on the Designated Bridge for this port's segment, two octet stringNone

node.name: forward-transisitions
node.description: The number of times this port has transitioned from the Learning state to the Forwarding stateNone

node.name: counters
node.description: The BPDU packet transmition statisticsNone

node.name: bpdu-sent
node.description: The number of BPDU packet sentNone

node.name: bpdu-received
node.description: The number of BPDU packet receivedNone

node.name: mstp

node.description: The Revision Level in the MST Configuration IdentifierNone

node.description: The max hop determines the number of bridges in an MST region that a BPDU can traverse before it is discardedNone
